definitions.definition: Placed after the word modified, either immediately after, as in two men abreast , or as part of a complement , as in those two men are bad .
labels: of an adjective or other modifier
definitions.label_groups: grammar , of an adjective or other modifier

main_definition: ( grammar , of an adjective or other modifier ) Placed after the word modified, either immediately after, as in two men abreast , or as part of a complement , as in those two men are bad .
